com.clarkparsia.openrdf.query.builder
Interface SupportsGroups<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
QueryBuilder<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractQueryBuilder, UnionBuilder
public interface SupportsGroups<T>

Interface for anything that supports having a collection of groups or sub-groups.

Since:
0.2.2
Version:
0.2.2
Author:
Michael Grove
